About:
Set in a fantastic 1930s world, â€œImpossible Creaturesâ€ is a 3-D, real-time strategy game by Relic Entertainment the creators of Homeworld, Dawn of War and Company of Heroes that pits the player against an evil villain in a desperate campaign across a chain of remote and diverse islands.
Using Earthâ€™s most formidable animals as building blocks, the player must create an army of genetically-altered mutant monsters in a titanic struggle to protect an unsuspecting world.
Thousands of units: â€œImpossible Creaturesâ€ has more than 50 animals that can be combined to create a vast number of mutant creatures, the results of which are limited only by your creativity.
Strategies as boundless as your imagination -- By building these creatures into powerful and effective armies, you can define your strategy and how you'd like to tackle your opponents.
Unprecedented replayability â€“ â€œImpossible Creaturesâ€ offers boundless creature combinations, armies, and strategies as well as online play and an easy-to-use mission editor that provides limitless play options.
